primitives.name: Ramp
primitives.description: Card advances mana development beyond normal land drop pacing.

primitives.name: Land Search
primitives.description: Card searches library for one or more lands.

primitives.name: Draw
primitives.description: Card causes controller to draw one or more cards.

primitives.name: Tutor
primitives.description: Card searches library for a specified card class and moves it.

primitives.name: Recursion
primitives.description: Card returns cards from graveyard to hand, battlefield, or library.

primitives.name: Removal
primitives.description: Card destroys or exiles a target permanent or creature.

primitives.name: Board Wipe
primitives.description: Card destroys or exiles broad sets of permanents.

primitives.name: Counterspell
primitives.description: Card counters target spell on the stack.

primitives.name: Hexproof Protection
primitives.description: Card grants hexproof or ward-like shielding.

primitives.name: Sac Outlet
primitives.description: Card repeatedly enables sacrificing permanents as cost/effect.

primitives.name: Token Production
primitives.description: Card creates one or more tokens.
